bibl.bibl: Tizard, T. H., et al. 1885. Narrative of the cruise of H.M.S. Challenger with a general account of the scientific results of the expedition. Vol. 1, part 1, of Report on the scientific results of the voyage of H.M.S. Challenger during the years 1873–76, superintended by Charles Wyville Thomson and John Murray. London: Her Majesty’s Stationery Office.
